channel.title: [562] port problem [508]
channel.description: How do i change what ports the server connects to on 508 clients and servers its on 43594 and i want it to be on 5555!

item.title: [562] port problem [508]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

The very much do to ThatCrackerZach.

I’m currently working with a 562.
They run off run.bat, and there isn’t just 1 compile.

There are several that compile each “Section” of the server individually.

As for the port, I’m not sure, I never had to change it.

Also, Sonicforce, I’m pretty sure he was correct.
508’s also have a client.java and If I remember correctly that is where the port is stored.

Read full topic

to change the ip in 562, i think it’s in class110.java[/quote]
508’s nor 562’s have client.java
